name: Tetris Recreation
description:
This was the first game that I was required to make for my degree, a recreation of 'Tetris'. 

There are two options in this game:
1. being the regular Tetris and
2. a modern 'Twist' on the old Tetris

The modern twist includes a new variation to the game that switches the regular gameplay style up.  For each different block, there is a corresponding 'ability' within that block. The abilities aren't specifically good, as there are some blocks that do negatively impact gameplay

Credits

Art assets were designed by me in Piskel

Audio credits goes to Nintendo - I am not making any profit from this game or its uses of audio

Garnet 2019
